imdb.plot outline: Weekly talk show/web-series, focusing on Nerd/Geek culture, Craft Beers/Cocktails, etc. Hosts, Danny Donovan and Anna Tozzi-Barbay take viewers through the news of the week often times with celebrity guests discussing the ins and outs of Pop Culture. From comic books, to films, to TV series, etc if it affects the Comic/Sci-fi world it gets covered. Geek Chic at it's best.
imdb.title: Comic Books & Cocktails
plot: Weekly web-series talk show that discusses all things in nerd culture, from film, TV, comics, and beyond finishing with a themed cocktail based around a popular comic book or sci-fi property.::Danny Donovan

Weekly talk show/web-series, focusing on Nerd/Geek culture, Craft Beers/Cocktails, etc. Hosts, Danny Donovan and Anna Tozzi-Barbay take viewers through the news of the week often times with celebrity guests discussing the ins and outs of Pop Culture. From comic books, to films, to TV series, etc if it affects the Comic/Sci-fi world it gets covered. Geek Chic at it's best.
